_header: A noble story writ I find / A pope that wrote…
Subjects: Trental of St Gregory; Gregory, saint; exempla

BlCottCalAII.First Lines:
A nobull story wryte y fyndeA pope hit wrote to haue yn
                    mynde…
BlCottCalAII.Last Lines: …Pray we all hit may so beAnd say Amen for charyte
BlCottCalAII.Note:
‘Explicit‭ by scribe in lower margin, f.
                    88ra.
BlCottCalAII.Attributed Title:
Trentale sancti gregorii (f. 86vb, by scribe in upper
                    margin); Trentale (as RT on f. 87v); The Trentall of St Gregory (f.
                    1, sixteenth-century list of contents)
